Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express, #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Sheridan/Catalpa
ShortDescription: 147 Outer DuSable Lk Shore Exp., 151 Sheridan buses rrted NB:Sheridan, Foster, Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan; SB: Sheridan, Hllywd, Broadway, Foster, Sheridan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express, #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Sheridan/Catalpa, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Sheridan, Foster, Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan.

Southbound buses will operate via Sheridan, Hollywood, Broadway, Foster, Sheridan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #111 111th/King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/103rd
ShortDescription: 111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Cottage Grove, 100th, and King Drive due to, street blockage near King Drive/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Cottage Grove, 100th, and King Drive due to, street blockage near King Drive/103rd.

Allow extra travel time.
